DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate image characteristic 18F-AV-1451 subject previous 18F-AV-1451 scan order ass rate change tau deposition time .
DOC.criteria: Have previous 18FAV1451 brain scan Can tolerate two Positron Emission Tomography ( PET ) image session Magnetic Resonance Imaging ( MRI ) scan Ability provide inform consent Current clinically significant psychiatric disease Are claustrophobic Current clinically significant cardiovascular disease ECG abnormalities , additional risk factor Torsades de Pointes Current clinically significant infectious disease , endocrine metabolic disease , pulmonary , renal hepatic impairment , cancer Females childbearing potential surgically sterile , refrain sexual activity use reliable method contraception Have nonstudy related radiopharmaceutical imaging treatment procedure within 7 day prior study image session
